In England, in the seven days to 12 November, there were 20,588 new confirmed cases (36.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 05 November, there were 24,424 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 16% (3,836 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 17 November is 20,248,860 (35,806.9 cases per 100,000 population).
